summary: This mod changes Lydia's combat style and her basic equipment to make her a stealthy follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][size=3]This mod changes Lydia's [b][u][i]combat style[/i][/u][/b] and her basic equipment to make her a stealthy follower. You can remove her hood.


If you install this mod [b][i][u]during your gameplay[/u][/i][/b], the changes to Lydia will be applied [b][i][u]only[/u] [/i][/b]after you level up.
If they do not show, you may want to open your console, click on Lydia, type ResetAI and then waiting for your next level up.


If you have installed a mod that modifies Lydia's face and body, this mod will not conflict. It is [b][u][i]fully compatible[/i][/u][/b].


She will now level [b][u][i]beyond level 50[/i][/u][/b]. Level cap (limit) has been removed.


This mod changes her [b][u][i]walking animation[/i][/u][/b]: she now has the default female walking animation
instead of the heavy muscular one.


She now has [b][u][i]stealth-related perks[/i][/u][/b] and specializes
in one handed attacks and ranged weapons. She won't trigger pressure plates and traps.


If you don't like her being a tank, then this is the mod for you.


[i][b][color=#ffd966]This mod is bug-free and does not edit other NPCs. Do not clean with TesVEdit.
[/color][/b][/i]



Image by [url=http://doomed-dreamer.deviantart.com/]Doomed-Dreamer[/url]
[/size][/font][/center]
author: Undriel
